verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Avenge the children of Israel of the Midianites : afterward shalt thou be gathered unto thy people.
And Moses spake unto the people , saying , Arm some of yourselves unto the war , and let them go against the Midianites , and avenge the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of Midian.
Of every tribe a thousand , throughout all the tribes of Israel , shall ye send to the war.\f + \fr 31.4 \ft Of…: Heb. A thousand of a tribe, a thousand of a tribe\f*
So there were delivered out of the thousands of Israel , a thousand of \add every\add* tribe , twelve thousand armed for war.

And Moses sent them to the war , a thousand of \add every\add* tribe , them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest , to the war , with the holy instruments , and the trumpets to blow in his hand. \p
And they warred against the Midianites , as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses ; and they slew all the males.

And they slew the kings of Midian , beside the rest of them that were slain ; \add namely\add*, Evi , and Rekem , and Zur , and Hur , and Reba , five kings of Midian : Balaam also the son of Beor they slew with the sword.
And the children of Israel took \add all\add* the women of Midian captives , and their little ones , and took the spoil of all their cattle , and all their flocks , and all their goods.
And they burnt all their cities wherein they dwelt , and all their goodly castles , with fire.
And they took all the spoil , and all the prey , \add both\add* of men and of beasts.

And they brought the captives , and the prey , and the spoil , unto Moses , and Eleazar the priest , and unto the congregation of the children of Israel , unto the camp at the plains of Moab , which \add are\add* by Jordan \add near\add* Jericho. \p
¶ And Moses , and Eleazar the priest , and all the princes of the congregation , went forth to meet them without the camp.
And Moses was wroth with the officers of the host , \add with\add* the captains over thousands , and captains over hundreds , which came from the battle.\f + \fr 31.14 \ft battle: Heb. host of war\f*
And Moses said unto them, Have ye saved all the women alive ?

Behold, these caused the children of Israel , through the counsel of Balaam , to commit trespass against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the matter of Peor , and there was a plague among the congregation of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
Now therefore kill every male among the little ones , and kill every woman that hath known man by lying with him.\f + \fr 31.17 \ft him: Heb. a male\f*
But all the women children , that have not known a man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves.

And do ye abide without the camp seven days : whosoever hath killed any person , and whosoever hath touched any slain , purify \add both\add* yourselves and your captives on the third day , and on the seventh day.

And purify all \add your\add* raiment , and all that is made of skins , and all work of goats’ \add hair\add*, and all things made of wood.\f + \fr 31.20 \ft that…: Heb. instrument, or, vessel of skins\f* \p
¶ And Eleazar the priest said unto the men of war which went to the battle , This \add is\add* the ordinance of the law which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses ;
Only the gold , and the silver , the brass , the iron , the tin , and the lead ,

Every thing that may abide the fire , ye shall make \add it\add* go through the fire , and it shall be clean : nevertheless it shall be purified with the water of separation : and all that abideth not the fire ye shall make go through the water.
And ye shall wash your clothes on the seventh day , and ye shall be clean , and afterward ye shall come into the camp. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,

Take the sum of the prey that was taken , \add both\add* of man and of beast , thou, and Eleazar the priest , and the chief fathers of the congregation :\f + \fr 31.26 \ft that…: Heb. of the captivity\f*
And divide the prey into two parts ; between them that took the war upon them, who went out to battle , and between all the congregation :

And levy a tribute unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of the men of war which went out to battle : one soul of five hundred , \add both\add* of the persons , and of the beeves , and of the asses , and of the sheep :
Take \add it\add* of their half , and give it unto Eleazar the priest , \add for\add* an heave offering of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And of the children of Israel’s half , thou shalt take one portion of fifty , of the persons , of the beeves , of the asses , and of the flocks , of all manner of beasts , and give them unto the Levites , which keep the charge of the tabernacle of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 31.30 \ft flocks: or, goats\f*
And Moses and Eleazar the priest did as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses.
And the booty , \add being\add* the rest of the prey which the men of war had caught , was six hundred thousand and seventy thousand and five thousand sheep ,
And threescore and twelve thousand beeves ,
And threescore and one thousand asses ,
And thirty and two thousand persons in all , of women that had not known man by lying with him.
And the half , \add which was\add* the portion of them that went out to war , was in number three hundred thousand and seven and thirty thousand and five hundred sheep :
And the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* tribute of the sheep was six hundred and threescore and fifteen.
And the beeves \add were\add* thirty and six thousand ; of which the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* tribute \add was\add* threescore and twelve.
And the asses \add were\add* thirty thousand and five hundred ; of which the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* tribute \add was\add* threescore and one.
And the persons \add were\add* sixteen thousand ; of which the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* tribute \add was\add* thirty and two persons.

And Moses gave the tribute , \add which was\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* heave offering , unto Eleazar the priest , as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* commanded Moses.
And of the children of Israel’s half , which Moses divided from the men that warred ,
(Now the half \add that pertained unto\add* the congregation was three hundred thousand and thirty thousand \add and\add* seven thousand and five hundred sheep ,
And thirty and six thousand beeves ,
And thirty thousand asses and five hundred ,
And sixteen thousand persons ;)

Even of the children of Israel’s half , Moses took one portion of fifty , \add both\add* of man and of beast , and gave them unto the Levites , which kept the charge of the tabernacle of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* commanded Moses. \p
¶ And the officers which \add were\add* over thousands of the host , the captains of thousands , and captains of hundreds , came near unto Moses :
And they said unto Moses , Thy servants have taken the sum of the men of war which \add are\add* under our charge , and there lacketh not one man of us.\f + \fr 31.49 \ft charge: Heb. hand\f*

We have therefore brought an oblation for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, what every man hath gotten , of jewels of gold , chains , and bracelets , rings , earrings , and tablets , to make an atonement for our souls before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 31.50  t gotten: Heb. found *
And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of them, \add even\add* all wrought jewels.

And all the gold of the offering that they offered up to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, of the captains of thousands , and of the captains of hundreds , was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty shekels.\f + \fr 31.52 \ft offering: Heb. heave offering\f*
(\add For\add* the men of war had taken spoil , every man for himself.)

And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds , and brought it into the tabernacle of the congregation , \add for\add* a memorial for the children of Israel before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
